name: Clause
subtitle: Knight of Iron Defense
description: Kasel's 'older brother'. A true knight, he is a man of steel who protects allies at the front of the battlefield. He blocks the attacks of the enemies while taking them down, earning him the reputation akin to a castle wall.
story: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

recruit.greet: Oh, there you are! How are you?
talk: How about applying for the Guardian Knights?
You look as trustworthy as ever.
Sometimes, the mouthguard of my helmet feels like it's trying to suffocate me. Hahaha!!
recruit.gift: Normally, I wouldn't accept - but I shall accept it as your sincerity.

affinity.greet: Ha ha! The Guardian Knights also need to rest. Come, take a seat here.
talk: I didn't expect Kasel to get that strong. He used to cry and follow me everywhere... And now he's the master of the Holy Sword... Ha ha.
Am I jealous of Kasel? No way! He's my brother, and I'm proud of him.
affinity.gift: All this... I'm flattered. I'll have to work even harder.

relationship.greet: Hahaha, good to see you again!
talk: My justice isn't really anything too fancy. A belief that I will never be ashamed of - that is my justice.
A high-ranking position doesn't mean you can get a lot done. It might get you stuck in the castle with all the paperwork.
I know I need to help that person, but right now, there are more pressing matters - the people suffering all across Orvelia.

uw.story: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

ut.story: A ceremonial cape used on special occasions of Orvelia. Ever since it was bestowed upon Clause on the day he was knighted, it reminds Clause of his early resolutions. Whenever he wants to quit, exhausted from all the battles, Clause would bring it out and contemplate on it. Young Kasel used to watch Clause do this and dream of becoming a knight.

ut.story: Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall. It's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

ut.story: Rune of the Orvel Guardian Knights. A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.
